```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(kableExtra)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.align = "center",
  fig.asp = 0.618,
  fig.width = 8,
  out.width = "80%",
  fig.dev = "svg"
  )

print_table <- function(x) {
  
  x |> 
    knitr::kable(align = "c", digits = 0) |> 
    kableExtra::kable_styling(
        full_width = FALSE,
        bootstrap_options = c("condensed", "hover")
    )

}
```
